title: 02/25/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 02/25/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the discussion continues regarding the futures of J.J. Watt and Deshaun Watson. Chris Simms joined the show in the first hour to discuss possible landing spots

as well as dive into mock drafts, including how Mac Jones could be a top ten pick. Nick Wright kicked off the second hour of the show by saying how the Jazz are not even close to championship contenders as well as slander barbeque in the Houston area. Sticking with

basketball, it’s no secret the three-point shot is taking over the game, thanks in large part to Steph Curry’s dominance behind the line. Tim Legler joined DP to talk about shooting in the NBA as well as breaking down Lonzo Ball and Kevin Durant’s signature jumper.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the discussion continues regarding the futures of J.J. Watt and Deshaun Watson. Chris Simms joined the show in the first hour to discuss possible landing spots

as well as dive into mock drafts, including how Mac Jones could be a top ten pick. Nick Wright kicked off the second hour of the show by saying how the Jazz are not even close to championship contenders as well as slander barbeque in the Houston area. Sticking with

basketball, it’s no secret the three-point shot is taking over the game, thanks in large part to Steph Curry’s dominance behind the line. Tim Legler joined DP to talk about shooting in the NBA as well as breaking down Lonzo Ball and Kevin Durant’s signature jumper.
